short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fatures a serene, misty mountain valley scene with a cozy wooden cabin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A weathered wooden bridge stretches across a narrow gorge, leading to the cabin surrounded by towering pines. The atmosphere is mysterious and tranquil, as light gently filters through the dense fog and illuminates the high cliffs in the background. Waterfalls cascade down the rocky mountains, enhancing the feeling of isolation and peace in this natural retreat.
